rules.starting-tiles-different-configuration: The River, The Count, GQ11, The Wind Roses and Spiel Doch Promo provides alternative starting configurations.
rules.farmers-description: Players are allowed to place followers on fields.
rules.garden-description: Can be occupied by an abbot.
rules.cathedral-description: Completed cities with cathedral ×3 instead of ×2, no points during final scoring.
rules.cathedral-disabled: Inns & Cathedrals expansion is not selected.
rules.inn-description: Completed roads with inn ×2, no points during final scoring.
rules.inn-disabled: No tile with Inn is in the game.
rules.princess-description: Princess can remove knight from a city.
rules.princess-disabled: Princess & Dragon expansion is not selected.
rules.portal-description: Through portal meeple can be placed on any tile.
rules.portal-disabled: Princess & Dragon expansion is not selected.
rules.bazaar-description: Land tiles are auctioned when bazaar comes into play.
rules.bazaar-disabled: Bridges, Castles and Bazaars expansion is not selected.
rules.hill-description: Used as tiebreaker. Also hides one random tile under it.
rules.hill-disabled: Hills and Sheep expansion is not selected.
rules.vineyard-disabled: Hills and Sheep expansion is not selected.
rules.pig-herd-description: Counts as additional pig on field (farmers scores more points).
rules.pig-herd-disabled: Neither GQ11 nor River II is selected.
rules.shrine-description: Shrine placed next to a monastery compete who finish feature first. (second gets no points)
rules.shrine-disabled: The Cult expansion is not in the game.
rules.festival-description: With festival tile you can return one of your own meeples instead of placing one.
rules.festival-disabled: Festival expansion is not in the game.
rules.siege-disabled: Siege expansion is not in the game.
rules.escape-diabled: Siege expansion is not in the game.

timer.at-game-start-set-timer-to: At game start set timer to

open-game.share-the-key: Share the key with other players to let them connect to the game.
open-game.waiting-for-host-to-start-the-game: Waiting for host to start the game.
open-game.name: Name

online.title: Public server hosted games
online.private-games-only: Only private games are now supported.
online.no-random-discovery: it means no random players discovery
online.remove-unfinished-game-confirmation: Do you want to permanently remove unfinished game from your list?
online.paste-a-game-key: Paste a game key provided by host

local.title: Player hosted games
local.create-directly-from: Create a new game directly from

bookmarks.title: My favorities
bookmarks.description-start: You have not game setup in favorites list. To add setup here create a game first and then use

join-game.title: Join Remote Game
join-game.description:
Connect to remote host with created game.
The game on remote host must be in color selection phase.

player.title: Player
player.nickname-description: Nickname used when player is assigned to a game.
player.preferred-color-description: Automatically take a color after game join.

tile-sets.abbey-mayor-release: The fifth major expansion released in 2007.
tile-sets.abbey-mayor-description: Each a player can also place Abbey tile from his supply.
tile-sets.base-game-description: You can play tiles with 1st Edition or New edition rules (eg. gardens). This can be selected in second game setup step.
tile-sets.bridges-castles-and-bazaars-release: The eight major expansion released in 2010. (Sixth major expansion Count, King and Robber is splitted into individual small modules. Seventh, The Catapult, is obvously skipped)
tile-sets.gq11-release: Originally released in Games Quarterly magazine in 2006.
tile-sets.hills-and-sheep-release: The ninth major expansion released in 2014.
tile-sets.inns-and-cathedrals-release: First major expansion for Carcassonne released in 2002.
tile-sets.king-and-robber-release: Originally released in 2003 as part of King & Scout. Later included in the sixth major expansion: Count, King & Robber (2007)
tile-sets.princess-and-dragon-release: The third major expansion released in 2005.
tile-sets.river-I-release: The River I is mini expansion released in 2001.
tile-sets.river-II-release: The River II was released in 2006 and now is contained in sixth major expansion Count, King & Robber.
tile-sets.tower-release: The fourth major expansion released in 2006.
tile-sets.traders-and-builders-release: The second major expansion released in 2003
tile-sets.winter-edition-description: Basic set from Winter Edition spin-off. Contains basic game extended with additional 12 tiles.
